author: Cara (Hip Sidekick)
title: 60% Off Women’s Cosmetic Bag on Amazon – Just $7.95 (Reg. $20)!
text:
60% Off Women’s Cosmetic Bag on Amazon – Just $7.95 (Reg. $20)!
As an Amazon Associate, Hip2Save earns a small commission from qualifying purchases in this post.
Read our full disclosure policy here.
Beauty is in the bag with an
Amazon deal!
Through January 8th, hurry over to
https://amzn.to/48hZyUK where you can score this Large Women’s Cosmetic Bag for only $7.95 (regularly $19.88 ) with promo code 60Q9B9TO at checkout or use this link.
This vinyl makeup bag features a checkerboard print with 3 interior pockets as well as a large internal main compartment, and sturdy double zipper pulls. This could also work as a man’s dopp kit.
Definitely worthy of the gift closet, and a nice way to treat yourself to a new makeup bag for the new year!
Here’s how to get this deal…
Large Women’s Cosmetic Bag $19.88
Use promo code 60Q9B9TO (60% off)
Final cost $7.95!
On the fence? Check out these reviews…
This makeup bag is just what I was looking for. It opens up wide and allows you to see your products. It is waterproof and stays pretty clean on the outside. It is not a sturdy bag as it shows in the picture, but it is sturdy enough to hold lots of your makeup products which I like. This is a good purchase for your makeup.
I purchased this for my teenager and it’s perfect!! The style makes it easy to find things in it and it is a durable material and easy to wipe clean.
This is my new vaca makeup bag. Love the flat bottom. Easy to have wide open without items falling out.
-
